properties.areaDesc: Scott, MO; Union, IL; Alexander, IL; Jackson, IL; Cape Girardeau, MO; Perry, MO
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 11:58AM CST until January 20 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...Missouri...Kentucky...

Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau...Thebes and New Madrid

.The Mississippi River at Cape Girardedau and Thebes have started to
fall and are forecast to go below flood stage over the weekend. New
Madrid is still rising and will crest at 37.8 feet on Sunday morning...
before start a very slow fall.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau.
* until late Sunday night.
* At 11:30 AM Thursday the stage was 36.8 feet.
* Flood Stage is 32.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall and is forecast to
below flood stage Sunday night.
* Impact...At 36.0 Feet...The flood gate on Themis Street closes.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
